greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of planted trees: all sub-rooted trees from any node are identical; non-root, non-leaf nodes an even distance from the root are of degree 2.
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
Index entries for sequences related to trees
formula: a(n+2) = Sum a(k), k|n. Shifts left two places under inverse Moebius transformation.
G.f. A(x) satisfies: A(x) = x + x^2 * (1 + A(x) + A(x^2) + A(x^3) + ...). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, May 09 2019
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[a[k], {k, Divisors[n-2]}]; a[1] = a[2] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 60}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 15 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
ext: New description from _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1998.
